name: Leather Vest
plaggComment: Better than nothing! Like wearing cheese instead of going naked.

name: Chain Mail
description: Interlocked metal rings provide decent protection.
plaggComment: Shiny and protective! Like wrapping yourself in cheese grater mesh.

name: Steel Plate Armor
description: Heavy steel plates offer excellent protection.
plaggComment: Heavy but effective! Like carrying a cheese wheel for protection.

name: Mithril Mail
description: Lightweight yet incredibly strong magical metal armor.
plaggComment: Magical protection! Probably made from crystallized cheese magic.

name: Dragon Scale Armor
description: Crafted from actual dragon scales, this armor is nearly impenetrable.
plaggComment: Dragon scales! I wonder if dragons like cheese too?

name: Celestial Robes
description: Robes woven from starlight itself, perfect for spellcasters.
plaggComment: Starlight robes! Do they come in cheese yellow?

name: Shadow Cloak
description: A cloak that bends light and shadow for rogues.
plaggComment: Sneaky cloak! Perfect for sneaking into cheese vaults.
